forum.content: Learning English is not difficult, and you should have strong motivations and patience to learn English. Basically, you have to memorize vocabulary first. And then, try to use those words to express what you think to others who might be concerned about. For sure, you have to maintain a good habit of reading and listening to English in your daily life. Thus, it could be possible for you to speak and write in full English. Go ahead! Everyone! It's a long way to go!
forum.title: Learning English is not difficult...
